name: Endeavor (II)

name: Flame Scourger

text: Response: After your rival plays a non-character response ability, cancel it.  Enhance Lose 2 health: Your next attack this turn gets -2 difficulty and +2 damage.

name: Seizing The Advantage
text: Form: Your next attack gets +2 speed.  Response [Card Pool]: After you play an attack, flip 1 rival foundation. Build this card face down.

name: Symbol Of Peace
text: While this card is in your card pool, your block modifiers get -1 and your rival's block modifiers get +1.  Enhance: Draw 1 card for each attack in your rival's card pool.

name: Special Edition Collectible
text: When you build this card, build it committed.  Form Remove: Reveal the top 10 cards of your deck and add 1 card revealed this way to your hand, then shuffle your deck.

name: Dark Shadow Emergence
text: Enhance Remove 1 foundation: If this is your first attack this turn, add 1 action from your discard pile to your hand.  First Enhance: If your character is committed, unflip 1 foundation.

name: Hardened Barrage
text: Enhance: This attack gets +1 speed for each copy of "Rapid Punches" in your card pool.  Enhance: This attack gets +1 damage for each copy of "Hardened Barrage" in your card pool.  Response: After this attack deals damage, unflip 1 foundation.

name: Piercing Thorn Lances
text: Enhance: Add 1 other attacklow attack from your card pool to your momentum.  Shiozaki Enhance: Your rival must reveal a high block as an additional cost to block this attack.

name: Rapid Punches
text: Enhance: This attack gets +1 speed for each copy of "Rapid Punches" in your card pool.  Enhance: This attack gets +1 damage for each copy of "Hardened Barrage" in your card pool.  Response: After this attack deals damage, draw 1 card.

name: Viscous Lunge
text: Enhance: If you have exactly 1 momentum, add the top card of your deck to your momentum.  Enhance Discard your entire momentum: Your rival loses 1 health for each momentum discarded this way. This effect cannot reduce your rival below 1 health.

name: Heroic Aspirations
text: Response: After your attack with "Smash" in its name deals damage, gain 1 health.  Deadlock Enhance Commit: Your next attack ignores progressive difficulty.

name: Petty Squabble
text: Response [Once per turn] Discard 1 card: After your rival plays an ability on a foundation, commit 1 rival copy of that card.  Enhance Commit your character: Both players discard 2 cards and draw 2 cards.

name: All Might (V)
text: Response [Twice per turn]: After you play a card with "Smash" in its name, draw 1 card.  Enhance Flip 1 foundation: Your Fury or Punch attack gets +2 speed or +2 damage.  Deadlock First Form [Once per game]: Your attacks with "Smash" in their name gain Stun: 2 for the rest of this turn.

name: Recovery Girl
text: First Form: Gain 2 health.  Response: After you take damage, build 1 foundation from your discard pile.  Enhance Destroy 2 foundations: Your attack gains Throw.

name: Living Up To His Example
text: First Enhance Remove: You may discard 1 card from your hand in addition to momentum to pay the cost of this attack's EX or Powerful ability. If your hand size is 6 or less, draw 1 card.

name: Flamethrower
text: Enhance Discard the top card of your deck: This attack gets +X speed. X equals the printed difficulty of the discarded card.  Enhance: If this attack deals 5 or more damage, destroy 1 rival foundation.

name: Gigantic Explosion
text: Combo Enhance Discard 1 momentum: Both players destroy 2 of their rival's foundations. This attack gets +X damage. X equals the total difficulty of the destroyed foundations.  Deadlock Enhance: Add the top 2 cards of your discard pile to your momentum.

name: Villainous Waylay
text: Enhance Name a block zone: Your rival must discard a card with the named block zone. If they cannot, they reveal their hand.

name: Photogenic Hero
text: Enhance Destroy: This attack cannot receive any more speed bonuses this Enhance Step.  Response Remove: After you block with a copy of your starting character, build it.
